name: Xcolors
body:
### Welcome to Linux BBQ GitHub page
Please feel free to browse the menu and have a taste

### On The Menu
  * [Color Palettes for X](https://github.com/linuxbbq/xcolors/tree/master/xcolor_code)  
  * [Palette Visuals](https://github.com/linuxbbq/xcolors/tree/master/xcolor_visual)  
  * [Patches](https://github.com/linuxbbq/xcolors/tree/master/scripts)   

### Wearing Aprons and Wielding Spatulas 
@machinebacon, @DebianJoe, @wuxmedia, @dkeg, @ivanovnegro, @pidsley

### Samples
[bbq]([url=http://postimage.org/][img]http://s19.postimg.org/71ol8jqtf/bbq.png[/img][/url] [url=http://postimage.org/app.php]screenshot program[/url])  
[rocks]([url=http://postimage.org/][img]http://s19.postimg.org/69lx9cmmb/rocks.png[/img][/url] [url=http://postimage.org/app.php]windows screenshot[/url])  
[flatgraytwo]([url=http://postimage.org/][img]http://s19.postimg.org/nberbg1hf/flatgraytwo.png[/img][/url] [url=http://postimage.org/]online photo sharing[/url])
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
